brief_description: The Government of Gujarat launched a financial Assistance scheme for the student who comes under the scheduled caste.
detailed_description: **Objective** - Main Objective is to provide economic support and motivation for education. Under this scheme, assistance is given to Students studying in classes 1 to 8. - Through this scheme, the Gujarat government promotes primary education.
benefits: Rs.900/- assistance for three pairs of uniforms.
eligibility_criteria: The student should be of Scheduled Caste. Students should be studying in classes 1 to 8. No Income Limit.

steps: Applicants need to visit the official website https://www.digitalgujarat.gov.in    New applicants have to register his/her self first. At the time of registration, applicants have to provide their mobile number, email & set password. Update their profile. Applying for the scholarship.

documents_required: Identity proof: Aadhar card, Voter ID, College ID, etc. Residence proof: PAN card, Residence certificate, etc. Income proof. Aadhar card. Passport-size photograph. Academics certificates. Bank details e.g. Account number, IFSC, MICR code. Other documents may be required. Caste certificate.
